ygData.subject: Re: Server/Guild Help
ygData.msgSnippet: I am looking for a strong active guild.  I thought I had found one. It had many players they were on all the time and helped out.  But they have had many
ygData.messageBody:
I am looking for a strong active guild. I thought I had found one.
It had many players they were on all the time and helped out. But
they have had many players leave the guild or leave the server, even
the officers. I would like a supportive guild who do things
together on more than a rare occasion and do not mind a semi
newbie. Even a small guild but who do things and are on more than
once a month.

thanks,
Christine


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Alexander Jones"
<alexander.jones@f...> wrote:
> Im on Kane, what are you searching for really?
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: jersey_jager [mailto:jersey_jager@y...]
> Sent: den 2 december 2003 04:26
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Server/Guild Help
>
>
> Evening noble players,
>
> I am new to this group and a semi-newbie back from a EQ break. My
> guild (Blackburrow Brawlers) has just about died out (on Kane
Bayle
> server). I am looking for a good server/guild that will allow me
to
> join and if necessary start fresh on a new server. Do any of you
> noble knights and ladies have any advice on where to go to find a
> good server and a strong active guild?
>
> Many thanks and blessings upon you, noble warriors...
>
> Xxana
> Cleric 7
>
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
